duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a 10-12 week summer internship program at the Jonesboro processing plant with exposure to various projects in Operations.
Engage in hands-on experiences and developmental training to enhance skills and knowledge in the Operations field.
Build affiliation with associate peers and interact with senior leadership to gain insight into the company's operations and business model.
Demonstrate initiative, leadership, teamwork, and commitment to completing assigned tasks in alignment with the Butterball Way.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduates in their junior year pursuing degrees in areas such as Agri-Business, Animal Science, Food Science, Meat Science, Ag Leadership, Business, Supply Chain, or related field.
Demonstrated participation in extracurricular activity, with a preference for a leadership role and on-campus involvement.
Previous work experience of any kind is preferred.
